birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省温州专区瑞安县
birth_place.en: Ruian County, Wenzhou Prefecture, Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，正国级领导人。现任中国共产党中央政治局常委，中华人民共和国国务院总理、党组书记。
description.en: A politician of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, a national-level leader. Currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CCP Central Committee, Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, and Secretary of its Party Leadership Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

zh-cn: 浙江农业大学宁波分校
浙江农村技术师范专科学校
浙江万里职业技术学院

description.zh-cn: 位于中国浙江省宁波市的一所全日制普通高等院校。
description.en: A full-time ordinary institution of higher learning located in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国浙江省杭州市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, China.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的干部培训机构。
description.en: A cadre training institution directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university located in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会
en: Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在浙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共浙江省委书记、中央书记处书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Party Secretary of Zhejiang and a secretary of the Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共浙江省委书记，现任中央港澳工作办公室主任、国务院港澳事务办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Zhejiang, and current Director of the Hong Kong and Macau Affairs Office of the State Council and the Central Hong Kong and Macau Work Office.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省的政务服务平台，旨在提供“互联网+政务服务”。
description.en: The government service platform of Zhejiang Province, aimed at providing 'Internet + government services'.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省推行的一项旨在简化行政审批流程、提高政府服务效率的改革。
description.en: A reform promoted by Zhejiang Province aimed at simplifying administrative approval processes and improving the efficiency of government services.

nodes.id: 长江三角洲区域一体化发展

zh-cn: 长江三角洲区域一体化发展
en: Integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在促进上海、江苏、浙江、安徽一体化发展的中国国家战略。
description.en: A national strategy of China aimed at promoting the integrated development of Shanghai, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, and Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 美国的一家电动汽车及清洁能源公司。
description.en: An American electric vehicle and clean energy company.

nodes.id: 2022年3月上海市2019冠状病毒病聚集性疫情

zh-cn: 2022年3月上海市2019冠状病毒病聚集性疫情

description.zh-cn: 2022年上半年在中国上海市发生的大规模2019冠状病毒病聚集性疫情，导致了长达两个月的封城。
description.en: A large-scale COVID-19 outbreak in Shanghai, China in the first half of 2022, which led to a two-month citywide lockdown.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府为应对2019冠状病毒病疫情而采取的一系列严格防控措施，旨在彻底消除社区传播。
description.en: A series of strict prevention and control measures adopted by the Chinese government in response to the COVID-19 pandemic, aimed at completely eliminating community transmission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 2022年11月在中国多地爆发的针对清零政策的抗议活动。
description.en: Protests against the zero-COVID policy that erupted in multiple locations across China in November 2022.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国国务院联防联控机制于2022年12月7日发布的进一步优化落实新冠肺炎疫情防控的十条措施，标志着清零政策的正式结束。
description.en: Ten measures for further optimizing the implementation of COVID-19 prevention and control, released by the Joint Prevention and Control Mechanism of the State Council of China on December 7, 2022, marking the official end of the zero-COVID policy.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李强的父亲。
description.en: Father of Li Qiang.

description.zh-cn: 李强的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Li Qiang.

description.zh-cn: 李强的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Li Qiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省温州市下辖的一个县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the jurisdiction of Wenzhou, Zhejiang Province, China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党上海市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会
en: Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai.

en: Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江苏省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Jiangsu Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党温州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党温州市委员会
en: Wenzhou Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在温州市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Wenzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委书记，现任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Shanghai, and current Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局委员、上海市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Party Secretary of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共江苏省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共江苏省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 李强出生于浙江省温州专区瑞安县。
description.en: Li Qiang was born in Ruian County, Wenzhou Prefecture, Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 李强是李锡局的儿子。
description.en: Li Qiang is the son of Li Xiju.

description.zh-cn: 李强是阮秀莲的儿子。
description.en: Li Qiang is the son of Ruan Xiulian.

description.zh-cn: 李强与林环是夫妻关系。
description.en: Li Qiang is the spouse of Lin Huan.

description.zh-cn: 李强在浙江农业大学宁波分校（现浙江万里学院）农业机械系农业机械化专业学习。
description.en: Li Qiang studied Agricultural Mechanization in the Department of Agricultural Machinery at Zhejiang Agricultural University, Ningbo Branch (now Zhejiang Wanli University).

description.zh-cn: 李强在浙江大学研究生课程进修班管理工程专业学习。
description.en: Li Qiang studied Management Engineering in the postgraduate course at Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 李强于2001至2002年在中共中央党校一年制中青年干部培训班学习，并于2001至2004年在中共中央党校在职研究生班世界经济专业学习。
description.en: Li Qiang studied at the one-year training program for young and middle-aged cadres at the Central Party School from 2001 to 2002, and also studied World Economy in the in-service postgraduate program at the Central Party School from 2001 to 2004.

degree.zh-cn: 高级管理人员工商管理硕士

description.zh-cn: 李强在香港理工大学管理学院工商管理专业学习并获得高级管理人员工商管理硕士学位。
description.en: Li Qiang studied Business Administration at the Faculty of Business of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University and obtained an Executive Master of Business Administration degree.

description.zh-cn: 李强于1983年4月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Li Qiang joined the Communist Party of China in April 1983.

position.en: Secretary-General of the Provincial Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 李强担任中共浙江省委秘书长期间，直接辅佐时任省委书记习近平，被外界视为习近平“之江新军”的主要人物。
description.en: While serving as the Secretary-General of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee, Li Qiang directly assisted the then-Provincial Party Secretary Xi Jinping, and is considered a key figure in Xi Jinping's 'Zhi Jiang New Army'.

position.en: Secretary-General of the Provincial Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 李强在习近平调离浙江后，继续担任省委秘书长，辅佐新任省委书记赵洪祝。
description.en: After Xi Jinping was transferred from Zhejiang, Li Qiang continued to serve as the Secretary-General of the Provincial Party Committee, assisting the new Provincial Party Secretary Zhao Hongzhu.

description.zh-cn: 李强担任浙江省省长期间，夏宝龙为省委书记。
description.en: While Li Qiang was the Governor of Zhejiang Province, Xia Baolong served as the Provincial Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 担任浙江省长期间，李强主导创立了浙江政务服务网，成为全国“互联网+政务服务”的样本。
description.en: During his tenure as Governor of Zhejiang, Li Qiang led the creation of the Zhejiang Government Service Network, which became a national model for 'Internet + Government Services'.

description.zh-cn: 在浙江政务服务网的基础上形成了浙江“最多跑一次”改革。
description.en: The 'Run at Most Once' reform in Zhejiang was formed on the basis of the Zhejiang Government Service Network.

relationships.target: 长江三角洲区域一体化发展

description.zh-cn: 在2018年上海第一届中国国际进口博览会上，习近平表态支持长江三角洲区域一体化发展上升为国家战略。
description.en: At the first China International Import Expo in Shanghai in 2018, Xi Jinping expressed support for elevating the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta to a national strategy.

relationships.target: 长江三角洲区域一体化发展

description.zh-cn: 在担任上海市委书记期间，李强推动了长三角区域一体化发展。
description.en: During his tenure as Party Secretary of Shanghai, Li Qiang promoted the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta region.

description.zh-cn: 担任上海市委书记期间，李强为特斯拉公司扫清道路，使其能够在2019年迅速启动上海超级工厂的建设。
description.en: During his tenure as Party Secretary of Shanghai, Li Qiang cleared the way for Tesla, Inc., enabling the company to quickly start the construction of its Shanghai Gigafactory in 2019.

relationships.source: 2022年3月上海市2019冠状病毒病聚集性疫情

description.zh-cn: 李强因在2022年上海新冠疫情封城期间出现的物资供应匮乏等各种乱象而遭到市民批评，其声誉受到负面影响。
description.en: Li Qiang was criticized by citizens for various chaotic situations, such as scarce material supplies, during the Shanghai COVID-19 lockdown in 2022, which negatively affected his reputation.

relationships.target: 2022年3月上海市2019冠状病毒病聚集性疫情

description.zh-cn: 据报道，2022年上海执行的严格封城措施是代表中共中央进驻上海的国务院副总理孙春兰的意见，她推动了更严格的封控。
description.en: It was reported that the strict lockdown measures implemented in Shanghai in 2022 were the opinion of Vice Premier Sun Chunlan, who, representing the CPC Central Committee in Shanghai, pushed for stricter controls.

description.zh-cn: 在升任中共中央政治局常委后，李强顶住压力，推动比预期更早地启动重新开放计划，并最终在2022年底事实上结束了清零政策。
description.en: After his promotion to the Politburo Standing Committee, Li Qiang resisted pressure and pushed for an earlier-than-expected reopening plan, effectively ending the zero-COVID policy by the end of 2022.

description.zh-cn: 时任中央应对疫情工作领导小组组长的李克强与李强共同决定比预期更早地启动重新开放计划，以应对疫情和经济困境。
description.en: As the then-head of the central leading group for COVID-19 response, Li Keqiang, along with Li Qiang, decided to launch the reopening plan earlier than expected to address the pandemic and economic difficulties.

description.zh-cn: 全国性的抗议活动成为中国政府迅速结束动态清零政策的催化剂。
description.en: The nationwide protests acted as a catalyst for the Chinese government to rapidly end its dynamic zero-COVID policy.

description.zh-cn: 在李强等领导人推动下，中国政府发布了防疫“新十条”，正式结束了动态清零政策。
description.en: Under the promotion of leaders including Li Qiang, the Chinese government released the 'New Ten Measures' for epidemic prevention, officially ending the dynamic zero-COVID policy.

relationships.target: 中国共产党上海市委员会
中国共产党江苏省委员会
中国共产党温州市委员会
中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 李强接替韩正出任中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Li Qiang succeeded Han Zheng as the Party Secretary of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 陈吉宁接替李强出任中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Chen Jining succeeded Li Qiang as the Party Secretary of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 李强接替罗志军出任中共江苏省委书记。
description.en: Li Qiang succeeded Luo Zhijun as the Party Secretary of Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 娄勤俭接替李强出任中共江苏省委书记。
description.en: Lou Qinjian succeeded Li Qiang as the Party Secretary of Jiangsu.
